programme.title: A Cape Cod Christmas
programme.desc: When a children's author hosts one last Christmas dinner with her disagreeable siblings before they sell the family house, she reunites with her childhood sweetheart who helps her find a way to keep the home she loves so dearly.

programme.title: A Sprinkle of Christmas
programme.desc: Libby, a baker, has opened up her business just in time for the Christmas season. She finds herself in a heated online feud with Peter after he gives the bakery a scathing review.

programme.title: A Christmas Vintage
programme.desc: Samantha goes home to help her love struck sister, Emily, during the holidays. She discovers that Emily and Tony can not be together unless Samantha attracts and dates the unpleasant Parker Williams, an owner of a competing winery.

programme.title: 12 Dares of Christmas
programme.desc: A teacher's quiet holiday season gets a jolt of spice when she accepts a 12 dares of Christmas challenge from her sister.

programme.desc: Erica reels from Sam's shocking news; Barbara struggles to bury the past.

programme.desc: Erica returns to her high school days in order to help an exchange student fit in.

programme.desc: The Clampetts show a boy how to have fun.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: To humor Granny, Jed fakes illness so that she can resume the doctoring that brought her fame in the hills.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: Granny defies medical opposition to her own brand of mountain medicine.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: Her neighbors are aghast when Granny decides to start a vegetable garden on the mansion grounds.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: Elly sparks a new trend in understated fashion when she enrolls in a finishing school.

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters
programme.desc: Drovers girls band together with the community to stop a dam being built upstream; Jaz is blackmailed by a pro-dam farmer; Patrick's trial run as overseer at Killarney ends in disaster.

programme.desc: Tayler's mom shows up at Drovers; Tayler is forced to face her problems; Stevie is concerned that her infant son has not smiled yet.

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters
programme.desc: Grace, Jaz, Marcus and Frank drive to the city to present their objections to a minister that is responsible for the Dam; Phil tries to patch things up with Moira by bringing her a very personal gift that catches her by surprise.

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters
programme.desc: Jaz's dad, Frank, plans to propose ; the minister working with the dam comes to visit; Frank lets his unstable side surface.

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters
programme.desc: Ben's former girlfriend Monique plays on his mind, but he and Marcus are forced to settle their differences and act as a team when they rescue a stolen dog.

programme.title: Sue Thomas F.B.Eye
programme.desc: Sue tries to honor a dying woman's request that her daughter's killer be brought to justice; Bobby, Jack and Myles compete over who can draw the highest bid as dream dates in a charity auction.

programme.desc: Jack and Sue go under cover as husband and wife to investigate a suburban couple suspected of having terrorist ties.

programme.desc: Becks, a romance columnist, decides to help her best friend, Casey, find his first love.
